chunks.title: How do I send tokens using NYLA?
chunks.body: Q: How do I send tokens using NYLA? A: Use the Send tab in NYLAGo, enter recipient username (without @), choose amount and token type, select blockchain network, then click 'Send to X.com' to generate transfer command. Post the command on X.com and NYLA will execute the transfer.
chunks.summary_en: Send tokens via NYLAGo Send tab: enter recipient, amount, token, network, then post generated command on X.com.
chunks.summary_zh: 通过NYLAGo发送选项卡发送代币：输入收件人、金额、代币、网络，然后在X.com上发布生成的命令。

chunks.title: What are the transaction fees?
chunks.body: Q: What are the transaction fees? A: Only blockchain network fees apply - no additional NYLA fees. Solana: ~$0.0001, Ethereum: $5-$50+ (varies with gas), Algorand: ~$0.001. NYLA doesn't charge extra fees beyond standard network costs.
chunks.summary_en: No NYLA fees, only network costs: Solana ~$0.0001, Ethereum $5-50+, Algorand ~$0.001.
chunks.summary_zh: 无NYLA费用，仅网络成本：Solana约0.0001美元，Ethereum 5-50+美元，Algorand约0.001美元。

chunks.title: How do I check transaction status?
chunks.body: Q: How do I check transaction status? A: After posting your NYLA command on X.com, NYLA will comment on your post with the transaction result. This usually takes about 1 minute to complete. Check your X.com post for NYLA's response with transaction hash and status.
chunks.summary_en: Check status via NYLA's comment responses on your X.com posts. Processing takes ~1 minute.
chunks.summary_zh: 通过NYLA在您的X.com帖子上的评论回复查看状态。处理需要约1分钟。

chunks.title: Is NYLA secure?
chunks.body: Q: Is NYLA secure? A: Yes! NYLA generates transfer commands but never handles your private keys. You maintain full control over your assets. Command-based transfers are transparent and verifiable. NYLAGo is open source for community review and operates without custodial services.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA is secure: no private key handling, transparent commands, open source, non-custodial design.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA安全：不处理私钥，透明命令，开源，非托管设计。

chunks.title: Which blockchains are supported?
chunks.body: Q: Which blockchains are supported? A: Currently Solana, Ethereum, and Algorand networks with operations within each network only. No cross-chain bridging supported. More networks may be added based on community demand and technical feasibility.
chunks.summary_en: Supports 3 networks: Solana, Ethereum, Algorand. Operations within-network only, no cross-chain.
chunks.summary_zh: 支持3个网络：Solana、Ethereum、Algorand。仅限网络内操作，无跨链。

chunks.title: What can NYLAGo do?
chunks.body: Q: What can NYLAGo do? A: NYLAGo generates commands for cryptocurrency operations through X.com: 1) Transfer tokens using usernames within Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand networks. 2) Swap tokens within the same blockchain network (no cross-chain swaps). 3) Generate QR codes for receiving payments. 4) Create X.com posts that execute transactions when posted. 5) Provide community engagement features like raid lists. All blockchain actions require posting generated commands on X.com.
chunks.summary_en: NYLAGo generates commands for transfers, same-network swaps, QR payments, and X.com execution. Includes community features.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLAGo生成转账、同网络交换、QR支付和X.com执行的命令。包括社区功能。

chunks.title: What else can NYLAGo do?
chunks.body: Q: What else can NYLAGo do? A: Beyond basic transfers and swaps, NYLAGo offers additional helpful features: 1) Username-based transfers - Send tokens using X.com usernames instead of complex wallet addresses. 2) QR code generation - Create payment QR codes for receiving cryptocurrency on any supported network. 3) Same-network token swaps - Trade tokens within Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand networks (no cross-chain). 4) X.com integration - All transactions happen through posting generated commands on X.com where NYLA executes them. 5) Community engagement tools - Access raid lists and social features for community interaction. 6) Multi-network support - Works across three major blockchain networks while maintaining simplicity.
chunks.summary_en: NYLAGo provides username-based transfers, QR payment requests, same-network swaps, X.com integration, and community tools beyond basic cryptocurrency operations.
chunks.summary_zh: 除了基本的加密货币操作，NYLAGo还提供基于用户名的转账、QR支付请求、同网络交换、X.com集成和社区工具。

chunks.title: What are the fees for each blockchain?
chunks.body: Q: What are the fees for each blockchain? A: Each blockchain has different fee structures. Solana: ~$0.0001 USD (ultra-low, fixed), Ethereum: $5-$50+ USD (variable gas fees, depends on network congestion), Algorand: ~$0.001 USD (very low, stable). NYLA doesn't add any additional fees - you only pay the standard blockchain network fees.
chunks.summary_en: Blockchain fees vary: Solana ~$0.0001 (lowest), Ethereum $5-50+ (highest, variable), Algorand ~$0.001 (low, stable). No NYLA fees added.
chunks.summary_zh: 区块链费用各不相同：Solana约0.0001美元（最低），Ethereum 5-50+美元（最高，可变），Algorand约0.001美元（低，稳定）。无NYLA费用。

chunks.title: Which blockchain is fastest?
chunks.body: Q: Which blockchain is fastest? A: Among supported networks, Solana is the fastest with up to 65,000 TPS theoretical capacity, followed by Algorand with ~6,000 TPS, and Ethereum with ~15-30 TPS on mainnet. Performance varies based on network conditions and congestion. Solana is known for being one of the fastest blockchains globally.
chunks.summary_en: Solana is fastest (65,000 TPS), followed by Algorand (6,000 TPS), then Ethereum (15-30 TPS). Performance varies with network conditions.
chunks.summary_zh: Solana最快（65,000 TPS），其次是Algorand（6,000 TPS），然后是Ethereum（15-30 TPS）。性能因网络状况而异。

chunks.title: How do I get started with NYLAGo?
chunks.body: Q: How do I get started with NYLAGo? A: Getting started is simple: 1) Visit https://sonyschan.github.io/nyla-go/ or load the NYLAGo extension. 2) Choose the Send, Receive, or Raid tab depending on what you want to do. 3) For transfers: Enter recipient's X.com username, amount, and network, then click 'Send to X.com'. 4) Post the generated command on X.com and NYLA will execute it. No account setup, registration, or security questions required - just an active X.com account and wallet with tokens.
chunks.summary_en: Start using NYLAGo immediately: visit the site/extension, choose Send/Receive/Raid tab, generate commands, post on X.com. No registration required.
chunks.summary_zh: 立即开始使用NYLAGo：访问网站/扩展，选择发送/接收/突袭选项卡，生成命令，在X.com上发布。无需注册。

chunks.title: How do I share my payment QR code?
chunks.body: Q: How do I share my payment QR code? A: First, generate your QR code in NYLAGo's Receive tab by connecting your wallet and clicking 'Generate QR Code'. Then download the QR image or display it on screen for others to scan. You can share the QR image via text, email, social media, or show it in person. The QR code is created within NYLAGo, not on X.com - X.com is only used for executing transfer commands.
chunks.summary_en: Generate QR codes in NYLAGo's Receive tab, then share the image via text, email, or display on screen. QR creation happens in NYLAGo, not X.com.
chunks.summary_zh: 在NYLAGo的接收选项卡中生成QR码，然后通过短信、邮件分享图像或在屏幕上显示。QR创建在NYLAGo中进行，而非X.com。

chunks.title: How do I send tokens?
chunks.body: To send tokens using NYLAGo: 1) Open NYLAGo and click the Send tab. 2) Enter the recipient's X.com username (no @ symbol needed). 3) Choose the token amount and type (SOL, ETH, ALGO, etc.). 4) Select the blockchain network that matches your token. 5) Click 'Send to X.com' to generate the transfer command. 6) Copy and post the generated command on X.com. 7) NYLA will execute the transfer and reply with confirmation. The whole process takes about 2-3 minutes including transaction confirmation.
chunks.summary_en: Send tokens through NYLAGo: use Send tab, enter recipient username, choose amount/token/network, generate command, post on X.com for execution.
chunks.summary_zh: 通过NYLAGo发送代币：使用发送选项卡，输入收件人用户名，选择金额/代币/网络，生成命令，在X.com上发布执行。
query_variations: How to send tokens step by step

chunks.title: What happens after I post the command?
chunks.body: Q: What happens after I post the command? A: Here's the complete automated workflow after posting your NYLA command on X.com: 1) NYLA automatically detects your post within seconds. 2) NYLA processes and validates the command format and details. 3) NYLA executes the blockchain transaction (transfer/swap) on the specified network. 4) NYLA replies to your X.com post with confirmation details including transaction hash. 5) The entire process completes in 30-60 seconds depending on network congestion. 6) You can verify the transaction in your wallet or blockchain explorer. The whole workflow is fully automated - you just post the command and wait for NYLA's confirmation reply.
chunks.summary_en: After posting: NYLA detects → validates → executes transaction → replies with confirmation. Complete automated workflow in 30-60 seconds.
chunks.summary_zh: 发布后：NYLA检测→验证→执行交易→回复确认。在30-60秒内完成自动化工作流程。
query_variations: What happens after I post the command?
What occurs after posting the command?
What happens after posting on X.com?
What does NYLA do after I post?

chunks.title: What is NYLA?
chunks.body: Q: What is NYLA? A: NYLA is an AI agent that executes blockchain transactions on X.com (formerly Twitter). When you post properly formatted commands on X.com, NYLA automatically detects them and executes cryptocurrency transfers, swaps, and other blockchain operations across Solana, Ethereum, and Algorand networks. NYLA acts as a bridge between social media and blockchain, making cryptocurrency operations as simple as posting a message. The AI agent handles all the complex blockchain interactions while you interact through familiar social media.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA is an AI agent that executes blockchain transactions through X.com posts. Post commands, NYLA executes them automatically.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA是一个通过X.com帖子执行区块链交易的AI代理。发布命令，NYLA会自动执行。
